About Me Text:
I'm a Full-Stack developer focused on the JavaScript ecosystem. My favorite programming languages are TypeScript and JavaScript, in which I have been creating applications that effectively solve real problems. 
I have an innovative and multifaceted mind. I am always excited to face new challenges and dedicate myself completely to them. 
My constant search is for maximum organization in my projects. I use entrepreneurial approaches, enthusiasm and constructive estimation, guided by strategic metrics to guide my progress.
school system description: This app allows for the management of student and staff data in a school, encompassing sign-in and sign-up systems, automatic email sending, avatars, and features provided based on CRUD operations for students and staff.
clean node api description: Clean Node API consists of a polling interface for programmers so that issues commonly faced in the dev environment are discussed to find ideal solutions. At the structural level, this project has a decoupled and well-defined architecture, using the TDD (Test Driven Development) methodology as a work guide, Clean Architecture to distribute responsibilities between the layers that make up the API. Furthermore, SOLID principles were followed at all times, applying the appropriate Design Patterns.
task mate description: It consists of a To Do List style system in which tasks to be completed can be handled. In addition, filters are available on such tasks.
code pix description: The Code Pix system is a system composed of microservices with the common goal of being a transaction hub between banks. To achieve this, concepts such as Hexagonal Architecture, Ports and Adapters, Test-Driven Development (TDD), gRPC, messaging systems, among others, were used.
vakinha burger description: Vakinha Burger hamburger administration and management application made using the Flutter framework for the web during the DW10 event. The system was built based on Futter Modular and MobX.
